title: What is a technology solutions company? - Quora
tags: Jobs and Careers at Specific Technology Companies
Jobs and Careers at Specific Companies

response.answer_text: If i am a big brick and mortar retail company X and i decide to start an e-commerce business. I will need one or many  Technology solutions company to handle various aspects such as1. The infrastructure (Servers, dbs, network,  other hardware needs etc.)2. The systems (Merchandising, listing, payment integration, order management, fraud check etc.)3. Ongoing Support  Some times the technology solutions companies can have their own products (SAP) or sometimes they could provide consultation services or both.
A company which provides solutions to the raised problems in society or their clients through the technology expertise they have are known as thee. For eg: Infosys, TCS etc.
